hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Regime Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC breaks above its 20-day Bollinger Band upper band while the regime is NEUTRAL, and this breakout is accompanied by a 50% increase in 24-hour volume relative to the 7-day average, the subsequent 5-day return will be positive with 65% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes often precede directional moves. Volume-confirmed breakouts from compression suggest institutional accumulation and reduced selling pressure. The 08:00-16:00 UTC filter captures institutional participation.
entry_conditions: BTC price > 20-day Bollinger Band upper band (2 std)
Breakout occurs between 08:00-16:00 UTC (active trading hours)

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5 days after entry OR +8% return, whichever comes first
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 days if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If fewer than 60% of such signals generate positive returns over 5 days in backtest across 2023-2024 data.
